appearance.color: Luminescent silver with iridescent blue markings
distinctive_features: Feathered wings with a single, large, translucent eye
Tail with a trailing, glowing plume

abilities.secondary: Ability to phase through solid objects
abilities.limitations: Cannot survive in environments with strong electromagnetic fields

behavior.social_structure: Solitary, with occasional gatherings during migration

lore.origin_story: Born from the union of a mortal and a celestial being, the Aetherwings were destined to bridge the realms.

legends.title: The Flight of the First Aetherwing
legends.summary: The legend tells of the first Aetherwing, who soared above the Ethereal Highlands, bringing harmony between the realms.
